Actions.Name: Greenwrath
Actions.Effect: Deals bonus damage and inflicts branded if a character is inside dangerous or difficult terrain.

Actions.Name: Vine Lash
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 must save or be shoved 4 in any direction. On a successful save they are shoved 2. They take 1 piercing damage for every space they move through difficult terrain during this shove.

Actions.Name: Wild Growth
Actions.TerrainEffect: Create a blast 1 area in range 6 of difficult terrain. The difficult terrain provides cover for allies.
